runs.comm: comes round the wicket, he stays back and tucks it to the on side
flicked away to the on side and SA are underway, deep square leg picks up
gets forward and pushes it to the off side
tossed up and he comes forward and defends

caught at square leg! Quinton de Kock comes down the pitch, Swart bowls this on the pads and de Kock has to play this to the on side, the bat turned, perhaps not where he intended to place the ball, square leg was pushed slightly back and an easy catch
flatter one and he comes forward and defends
An appeal for a run out! This was really wide outside off and cut away to backward point, Amla has to hurry the second run and the throw is to the keeper, he makes his ground
that was a classic square cut, this was short and wide outside the off stump and he didn't have to stretch much, crashed it wide of backward point
looks to drive straighter and he gets an inside edge to the leg side
persists bowling it wide outside off and he cuts to point
short and wide again and another cut finds backward point
this was wide again but fuller, he leans down to drive but gets an inside edge, just a single
this was fired wide down the leg side
on the pads and he knocks it to the on side
stamp of class there, this was a flatter delivery and yet Amla went down the track and adjusted well and lofted it straight down the ground
goes over the off side this time, this was tossed up a bit more, he went forward and scooped it over cover
and now over the leg side, this was flighted on leg and he got on his knee and swept it over short fine leg
edged past the keeper and there's no slip! False shot so a lucky escape for Amla, this was quicker and a thick edge that races to third man, tough chance for the keeper though
this was cleanly struck, tossed up on the off stump and he comes forward and chips it high over mid-off, 23 off the over!
stays beside the line and chops it wide of point
Amla's out there to belt everything, this was dragged a bit too short, slow pitch and he had time to pull this in front of square
keeps him quiet for a change, he stays back and defends
he swivels and walks right across his stumps aiming to pull, mistimed but the ball rolls to the leg side
he goes back and taps it to the off side
keeps it nice and straight and he stays back and defends
Amla didn't quite time this well, this was full and he looked to loft down to long-on, mid-on runs back and the ball evades him
didn't look fully in control but good enough to reach the straight boundary, didn't time it as well, made room and cleared the back leg to loft

Malik gets his man and the explosive Amla walks back! Malik comes round the wicket and gives him a bit of width, Amla looked to slam it past the covers, the fielders were confident he had nicked it and so was the umpire
fuller in length and he pushes it down to mid-on
he comes down the pitch and mistimes it to the on side
looked like a slower ball and he punched it to wide long-on
van Beek starts off nice and straight, on middle and he tucks it to midwicket
he stays back and punches it to the on side
this was full and swinging in, he turns the bat and works it to midwicket
punishes a low full toss, du Plessis comes down the pitch early and pounds a low full toss straight down the ground down to long-off
this one swings down the leg side and he tries to work it to the leg side
action replay, van Beek's directing his inswingers too wide down the leg side
he comes down the track and knocks it to the on side
fine leg was up in the circle and yet van Beek fed him a full delivery swinging on the pads, easy flick of the wrists, forget about chasing it
fullish on the pads and worked away to square leg
good length ball on the off stump and punched towards mid-off
goods length outside off and punched straight to mid-off
this was full and swinging away and driven down to deep cover
straight drive by AB but a bit too straight as it strikes the stumps at the other end, the ball deflects and goes down the ground
down to third man and there's no slip, he comes down the track to a slower ball and plays too early, outside edge down to third man
he drops it too short, he gets on his knee and pulls but mistimes it
tossed up outside off and driven to the off side
this was a full toss and he uses his wrists well and flicks it wide of mid-on and midwicket, the fielder at wide long-on dives in vain
another full toss and he punches it to the off side
he turns it to deep midwicket and du Plessis really had to hurry that second run, the throw was just wide and he dived and nearly pulled his hamstring, luckily he's okay
uppishly driven to sweeper cover for a single
he comes down the track and drills a low full toss down to long-off
flatter one and he pushes it down to long-on
he bowls this flatter and drags it short, he makes room and thumps it over extra cover
shot! Tossed up and he makes a bit of room to free his arms, du Plessis lofts this high over wide long-off
taken in the deep after that six! Tossed up on middle and leg, du Plessis takes a couple of paces down and he flicks it high down to deep midwicket, van Beek takes it at the edge of the circle
full outside off and driven to the off side
good length on middle and leg and flicked to the on side
comes down the track and looks very ungainly as he flicks a low full toss down to deep midwicket, Morkel wasn't as quick and had to hurry the second run
times this one well down to long-on
Morkel looks to slam that one away wide of point, didn't expect the extra bounce, nearly nicked it
he stays beside the line and cuts it to the off side
he comes down the track and pulls a length ball down to deep midwicket

they've got AB and that's a big wicket! You would have to say he threw his wicket away, there was a deep cover in place and AB found him, he was down the track to a length ball and punched it inside out straight to Ben Cooper
fuller ball and clipped to long-on
fullish delivery on the off stump and he punches it back to the bowler
shuffles and tucks it to the on side
fullish on the off stump and drilled down to long-on
full on the stump and he looks to drive down the ground but places it straight to the bowler
he stays back and punches it to the on side
down the track and he clips a low full toss down to deep midwicket
flatter one and he punches it down to cover
flatter one and he drills it down to long-on
drops it a bit short, he goes back and punches it to deep point
this was fuller outside off and pushed to the off side
full outside the off stump and he drives him to sweeper cover
slower ball outside the off stump and pushed towards cover
it's a low full toss on the pads and he whips it to deep midwicket
fuller in length outside off and he pushes it to the off side

another South African throws his wicket away and it's Morkel this time, Malik bowls this fuller and he looks to clear deep midwicket, doesn't get the distance, went off the base of the bat, Ben Cooper takes the skier at deep midwicket
gives it more air and he drives to long-on
on the pads and he drives to long-on
quicker one and he comes forward to defend
he makes room and cuts to deep point
drops it a bit short and he rocks back and punches it to sweeper cover
comes down the track and drives to deep midwicket
full and moving away, he gets his bat down and drills it to cover
length ball outside the off stump and he punches him down to long-off
this was a good length ball outside off and he punches it to point and well stopped
fires that full on the stumps and he works it down to long-on
low full toss outside the off stump and he flicks it across the line to deep midwicket
he looks to pull this one which wasn't very short, mistimes it to the leg side
good length on middle and leg and clipped to the leg side
a big swing and a miss, this was outside off and moving away, looked to swing this to deep midwicket
looked to clip this to fine leg and it clipped the pad but unfortunately the umpire didn't spot it, wide called
punched in the air but there was nobody at extra cover, didn't look in control
this was a length ball and he swiveled and pulled and it went down to deep square leg
6 down and he's caught down the leg side! The ball was drifting down leg, Duminy looked to clip it to the leg side and the finger went up quickly, may have clipped the glove
this was a length ball wide outside the off stump and he leaves it alone
full on the pads and he flicks it to deep square leg
continues round the wicket, on the pads and flicked down to long-on
full outside the off stump and he heaves it to deep midwicket
and at last a boundary! The first for eight overs, well timed there, this was full outside the off stump and moving away, Steyn bent down and caressed it wide of backward point
Will SA even last 20 overs? This was another fuller one outside off, he made a lot of room and looked to drive and got a thin edge to the keeper Barresi
he stays beside the line and punches it to point
it's a low full toss which he pushes towards long-on
this was a length ball outside off which he pulls to deep midwicket
he stays beside the line and punches it to point
this was fired fuller on the off stump, really well bowled there, can only push it back to the bowler
and yet again excellent bowling, a yorker and he nearly lost his balance in trying to dig that out, single to midwicket
how many soft dismissals have we seen today? This was pitched up and Hendricks looked to deposit that over the on side, miscued and gets a top edge that swirls to cover, easy catch
a slower ball and an ungainly heave down to deep midwicket
fuller ball and he clips it to the on side
this was chipped in the air and it drops down to deep midwicket

that's a five-for for Ahsan Malik! This was fuller and swinging towards the off stump, not sure what Miller was trying but he played all around it, the ball clips the off stump, these are the best figures by an Associate bowler against a Full Member side in a T20 international
he can't make it six for the road! It clips Tsotsobe's pads and rolls away
Any run scored by these two is like gold dust! And it's four of them, fullish in length outside the off stu,p and he makes room and slams it wide of deep cover
he clips it wide of mid-on for a couple
tough chance! This was full on the stumps and he makes room and looks to carve it over point, he spoons it up and the fielder makes a good attempt at catching it behind him but the ball evades him
full outside off and he drives him down to cover
Tahir walked right across his stumps looking to swipe this to fine leg but failed to read the slower ball, the keeper failed to collect and they take a bye
thuds a low full toss to cover and it will only be a single so SA end with 145
